categories: Category:Star Wars: Dawn of the Jedi

nodes.text: Dawn of the Jedi: The Prisoner of Bogan 4

Dawn of the Jedi: The Prisoner of Bogan 4 is the fourth issue in the Prisoner of Bogan story arc of the Star Wars: Dawn of the Jedi comic book series and the ninth issue of the series in total. It is set in the earliest days of the Jedi Order, in a time before the polarization of the light and dark sides of the Force. This issue was released on March 27 2013.
Even as the Je'daii close in on the mysterious Xesh and his mad ally Daegen Lok, a third party has entered the chase—a powerful woman from Xesh's past.
Meanwhile, Lok has sought the help of old enemies to help him attain a common goal—the downfall of the Je'daii!
